Verses: 1 pinnum Karththar Moseyaiyum Aaronaiyum Nokki:

2 oru Manidhanudaiya Sareeraththinmel Kushtarogampolirukkira Oru Thadippaavadhu Asaraavadhu Vellaippadaraavadhu Undaanaal, Avan Aasaariyanaagiya Aaronidaththilaagilum, Aasaariyaraagiya Avan Kumaararil Oruvanidaththilaagilum Konduvarappadakkadavan.

3 appozhudhu Aasaariyan Avan Sareeraththinmel Irukkira Rogaththaip Paarkkavendum; Rogam Irukkum Idaththil Mayir Veluththum, Rogamulla Idam Avanudaiya Matra Sareeraththaippaarkkilum Adhigamaaik Kuzhindhum Irundhaal Adhu Kushtarogam; Aasaariyan Avanaip Paarththapinbu, Avanaith Theettullavan Endru Theerkkakkadavan.

4 avan Sareeraththinmel Vellaip Padarndhirundhaalum, Avvidam Avanudaiya Matrath Tholaippaarkkilum Adhiga Pallamaayiraamalum, Adhin Mayir Vellaiyaaga Maaraamalum Irundhaal, Aasaariyan Avanai Ezhunaal Adaiththuvaiththu,
5 ezhaam Naalil Avanaip Paarkkakkadavan; Tholil Rogam Adhigappadaamal, Avan Paarvaikku Rogam Nindrirundhaal, Aasaariyan Irandaandharam Avanai Ezhunaal Adaiththuvaiththu,

6 irandaandharam Avanai Ezhaamnaalil Paarkkakkadavan; Tholil Rogam Adhigappadaamal Surungiyirundhaal, Aasaariyan Avanai Suththamullavan Endru Theerkkakkadavan; Adhu Asaru; Avan Than Vasthirangalaith Thoiththu Suththamaayiruppaanaaga.

7 thannai Suththamullavan Endru Theerkkiradharku Avan Thannai Aasaariyanukkuk Kaanbiththapinbu, Asaru Tholil Adhigamaaip Padarndhirundhaal, Avan Marupadiyum Aasaariyanukkuth Thannaik Kaanbikkakkadavan.
8 appozhudhu Asaru Tholile Padarndhadhu Endru Aasaariyan Kandaal, Aasaariyan Avanaith Theettullavan Endru Theerkkakkadavan; Adhu Kushtarogam.
9 kushtarogam Oru Manidhanukku Irundhaal, Avanai Aasaariyanidaththil Konduvaravendum.
10 appozhudhu Aasaariyan Avanaip Paarththu, Tholile Vellaiyaana Thadippirundhu, Adhu Mayirai Venmaiyaaga Maarappannitrendrum, Andhath Thadippulla Idaththile Ranamaamsam Undendrum Kandaal,
11 adhu Avan Sareeraththilulla Naalpatta Kushtam; Avan Theettullavan. Aadhalaal, Aasaariyan Avanai Adaiththu Vaikkaamal, Theettullavan Endru Theerkkakkadavan.
12 aasaariyan Paarkkira Idangalengum Tholile Kushtam Thondri, Andha Rogamullavanudaiya Thalai Thodangi Avan Kaalmattum Adhu Thegamuzhuvadhaiyum Moodiyirukkakkandaal,

13 appozhudhu Aasaariyan Paarththu, Kushtam Avan Sareeram Muzhuvadhaiyum Moodiyirundhaal, Avanai Suththamullavan Endru Theerkkakkadavan; Avan Udambellaam Venmaiyaaipponapadiyaal, Avan Suththamullavan.
14 aanaalum Ranamaamsam Avanil Kaanappattaal, Avan Theettullavan.
15 aagaiyaal, Ranamaamsaththai Aasaariyan Kaanumpodhu, Avanaith Theettullavan Endru Theerkkakkadavan; Ranamaamsam Theettulladhu; Adhu Kushtam.
16 alladhu, Ranamaamsam Maari Venmaiyaanaal, Avan Aasaariyanidaththukku Varavendum.
17 aasaariyan Avanaip Paarththu, Rogamulla Idam Venmaiyaaga Maarinadhendru Kandaal, Aasaariyan Avanai Suththamullavan Endru Theerkkakkadavan; Avan Suththamullavan.
18 sareeraththinmel Pun Undaayirundhu Aarippoi,
19 avvidaththile Oru Vellaiththadippaavadhu Sivappu Kalandha Oru Vellaippadaraavadhu Undaanaal, Adhai Aasaariyanukkuk Kaanbikkavendum.

20 aasaariyan Adhaip Paarththu, Avvidam Matrath Tholaippaarkkilum Kuzhindhirukkavum, Adhin Mayir Vellaiyaaga Maariyirukkavum Kandaal, Aasaariyan Avanaith Theettullavan Endru Theerkkavendum; Adhu Punnil Ezhumbina Kushtam.
21 aasaariyan Adhaip Paarththu, Adhil Vellaimayir Illai Endrum, Adhu Matrath Tholaippaarkkilum Kuzhindhiraamal Surungiyirukkiradhu Endrum Kandaanaagil, Avanai Ezhunaal Adaiththuvaiththu,
22 adhu Tholil Adhigamaaip Padarndhirukkak Kandaal, Avanaith Theettullavan Endru Theerkkakkadavan; Adhu Kushtandhaan.
23 andha Vellaippadar Adhigappadaamal, Avvalavil Nindrirukkumaagil, Adhu Punnin Thazhumbaayirukkum; Aagaiyaal, Aasaariyan Avanai Suththamullavan Endru Theerkkakkadavan.
24 oruvanudaiya Sareeraththinmel Neruppuppattadhinaale Vendhu, Andha Vekkaadu Aarippona Idaththile Sivappaana Padaraavadhu Venmaiyaana Padaraavadhu Undaanaal,

25 aasaariyan Adhaippaarkkakkadavan; Andhap Padarile Mayir Venmaiyaaga Maari, Avvidam Matrath Tholaippaarkkilum Pallamaayirundhaal, Adhu Vekkaattinaal Ezhumbina Kushtam; Aagaiyaal, Aasaariyan Avanaith Theettullavan Endru Theerkkakkadavan; Adhu Kushtarogandhaan.
26 aasaariyan Adhaip Paarkkirapodhu, Padarile Vellaimayir Illai Endrum, Adhu Matrath Tholaippaarkkilum Kuzhindhiraamal, Surungiyirukkiradhu Endrum Kandaanaagil, Avanai Ezhunaal Adaiththu Vaiththu,
27 ezhaamnaalil Avanaip Paarkkakkadavan; Adhu Tholil Adhigamaaip Padarndhirundhaal, Aasaariyan Avanaith Theettullavan Endru Theerkkakkadavan; Adhu Kushtarogam.

28 padaraanadhu Tholil Perugaamal, Avvalavil Nindru Surungiyirundhadhaagil, Adhu Soottinaal Undaana Thazhumbu; Aasaariyan Avanai Suththamullavanendru Theerkkakkadavan; Adhu Soottinaal Vandha Vekkaadu.
29 purushanukkaagilum Sthreekkaagilum Thalaiyilaavadhu Thaadiyilaavadhu Oru Sori Undaanaal,

30 aasaariyan Adhaip Paarththu, Avvidam Matraththolaippaarkkilum Pallamum Adhile Mayir Pon Niramum Mirudhuvumaayirukkakkandaal, Aasaariyan Avanaith Theettullavanendru Theerkkakkadavan; Adhu Thalaiyilum Thaadiyilum Undaagira Sorikushtam.

31 aasaariyan Andha Sorikushtaththaip Paarkkumpodhu, Avvidam Matraththolaippaarkkilum Pallamaayiraamalum Adhile Karuththamayir Illaamalum Irukkakkandaal, Aasaariyan Avanai Ezhu Naal Adaiththuvaiththu,
32 ezhaamnaalil Aasaariyan Adhaip Paarkkakkadavan; Andha Sori Idankollaamalum Adhile Ponniramayir Illaamalum, Avvidam Matraththolaip Paarkkilum Pallamillaamalum Irundhaal,
33 andha Soriyulla Idanthavira, Matra Yaavaiyum Avan Siraiththukkollakkadavan; Pinbu, Aasaariyan Irandaandharam Avanai Ezhu Naal Adaiththuvaiththu,

34 ezhaam Naalil Adhaip Paarkkakkadavan; Sori Tholil Idankollaamalum, Avvidam Matrath Tholaippaarkkilum Pallamillaamalum Irundhaal, Aasaariyan Avanai Suththamullavan Endru Theerkkakkadavan; Avan Than Vasthirangalaith Thoiththapin Suththamaayiruppaan.
35 avan Suththamullavanendru Theerkkappattapin, Andha Sori Tholil Idankondadhaanaal,
36 aasaariyan Avanaip Paarkkakkadavan; Sori Tholil Idankondirundhaal, Appozhudhu Mayir Ponniramaa Allavaa Endru Aasaariyan Visaarikkavendiyadhillai; Avan Theettullavane.
37 avan Paarvaikku Andha Sori Neengi, Adhil Karuththamayir Mulaiththadheyaagil, Sori Sosthamaayitru; Avan Suththamullavan; Aasaariyan Avanai Suththamullavan Endru Theerkkakkadavan.
38 oru Purushanukkaagilum Sthreekkaagilum Avargal Sareeraththinmel Vellaip Pulligal Undaayirundhaal,
39 aasaariyan Paarkkakkadavan; Avargal Sareeraththile Mangina Vellaip Pulligal Irundhaal, Adhu Tholil Ezhumbugira Vellaith Themal; Avargal Suththamullavargal.
40 oruvanudaiya Thalaimayir Udhirndhu, Avan Mottaiyanaanaalum Avan Suththamaayirukkiraan.
41 avanudaiya Munnanthalai Mayir Udhirndhaal, Avan Arai Mottaiyan; Avanum Suththamaayirukkiraan.
42 mottaiththalaiyilaavadhu Araimottaiththalaiyilaavadhu Sivappukkalandha Venmaiyaana Padar Undaanaal, Adhu Adhil Ezhumbugira Kushtam.

43 aasaariyan Avanaip Paarkkakkadavan; Avanudaiya Mottaiththalaiyilaavadhu Araimottaiththalaiyilaavadhu, Matra Angangalinmel Undaakkum Kushtaththaippola, Sivappukkalandha Venmaiyaana Thadippu Irukkak Kandaal,
44 avan Kushtarogi, Avan Theettullavan; Aasaariyan Avanaith Theettullavan Endru Theerkkakkadavan; Avan Vyaadhi Avan Thalaiyile Irukkiradhu.
45 andha Vyaadhi Undaayirukkira Kushtarogi Vasthiram Kizhindhavanaayum, Than Thalaiyai Moodaadhavanaayum Irundhu, Avan Than Thaadiyai Moodikkondu, theettu, Theettu Endru Saththamidavendum.

46 andha Vyaadhi Avanil Irukkum Naalvaraikkum Theettullavanaaga Ennappadakkadavan; Avan Theettullavane; Aagaiyaal, Avan Thaniye Kudiyirukkavendum; Avan Kudiyiruppu Paalayaththukkup Purambe Irukkakkadavadhu.
47 aattumayir Vasthiraththilaavadhu, Panjunool Vasthiraththilaavadhu,
48 panjunool, Alladhu Aattumayiraana Paavilaavadhu, Oodaiyilaavadhu, Oru Tholilaavadhu, Tholinaal Seydha Endhavidha Vasthuvilaavadhu Kushtadhosham Thondri,

49 vasthiraththilaavadhu, Tholilaavadhu Paavilaavadhu, Oodaiyilaavadhu, Tholinaal Seydha Endhavidha Vasthuvilaavadhu Kushtadhosham Pachchaiyaayaavadhu Sivappaayaavadhu Kaanappattaal Adhu Kushtamaayirukkum; Adhai Aasaariyanukkuk Kaanbikkavendum.
50 aasaariyan Adhaip Paarththu, Ezhunaal Adaiththuvaiththu,

51 ezhaam Naalile Adhaip Paarkkakkadavan; Vasthiraththilaavadhu, Paavilaavadhu, Oodaiyilaavadhu, Tholilaavadhu, Tholinaal Seydha Endhavidha Vasthuvilaavadhu Adhu Adhigappattirundhaal, Adhu Arikkira Kushtam; Adhu Theettaayirukkum.

52 andhath Thosham Irukkira Aattu Mayirinaalum Panjunoolinaalum Seydha Vasthiraththaiyum Paavaiyum, Oodaiyaiyum, Tholinaal Seydha Endhavidha Vasthuvaiyum Sutterikkakkadavan; Adhu Arikkira Kushtam; Aagaiyaal Akkiniyil Sutterikkappadavendum.
53 vasthiraththin Paavilaavadhu, Oodaiyilaavadhu, Tholinaal Seydha Endhavidha Vasthuvilaavadhu, Andhath Thosham Adhigappadavillai Endru Aasaariyan Kandaal,
54 appozhudhu Aasaariyan Adhaik Kazhuvachcholli, Irandaandharam Ezhu Naal Adaiththuvaiththu,

55 adhu Kazhuvappattapinbu Adhaip Paarkkakkadavan; Andhath Thosham Adhigappadaadhirundhaalum Adhu Niram Maaraadhadhaayirundhaal Theettaayirukkum; Akkiniyil Adhai Sutterikkavendum; Adhu Avvasthiraththin Utpuraththilum Velippuraththilum Uruva Arikkum.
56 kazhuvappattapinbu Adhu Kurugitrendru Aasaariyan Kandaaneyaagil, Adhai Vasthiraththilaavadhu, Tholilaavadhu, Paavilaavadhu, Oodaiyilaavadhu Iraadhapadikku Eduththuppodavendum.

57 adhu Innum Vasthiraththilaavadhu, Paavilaavadhu, Oodaiyilaavadhu, Tholinaal Seydha Endhavidha Vasthuvilaavadhu Kaanappattaal, Adhu Padarugira Thosham; Aagaiyinaal Adhu Ulladhai Akkiniyil Sutterikkavendum.

58 vasthiraththin Paavaavadhu, Oodaiyaavadhu, Tholinaal Seydha Endhavidha Vasthuvaavadhu Kazhuvappattapinbu, Andhath Thosham Adhaivittup Poyitreyaanaal, Irandaandharam Kazhuvappadavendum; Appozhudhu Suththamaayirukkum.

59 aattumayiraalaagilum Panjunoolaagilum Neydha Vasthiraththaiyaavadhu, Paavaiyaavadhu, Oodaiyaiyaavadhu, Tholinaal Seydha Endhavidha Vasthuvaiyaavadhu, Suththamendraavadhu Theettendraavadhu Theerkkiradharku, Adhinudaiya Kushtadhoshaththukkaduththa Pramaanam Idhuve Endraar.
